text:
Update from 2015 IHG Americas Owners Conference
The Holiday Inn brand is introducing new guest experience features focused on guestroom design and the brand’s food and beverage offering. The design and service innovations were developed in collaboration with Holiday Inn hotel owners and target guests to meet the changing needs of contemporary leisure and business travelers.
Staybridge Suites® Urban Guest Room Design
The Staybridge Suites brand is announcing its Urban Guest Room Design created specifically for future hotel developments in urban markets. The new design addresses our owners’ need to maximize land use more efficiently in urban locations where the hotel footprint is generally smaller compared to suburban properties.
Holiday Inn® Brand Family In-Room Coffee Experience
Beginning in 2016, all Holiday Inn and Holiday Inn Express® hotels in the United States will introduce a new in-room coffee experience featuring Keurig® K130 brewers and select Keurig® K-Cup® coffee products. With the Keurig single cup brewing system, guests can brew a single cup at the touch of a button, and enjoy a fresh, delicious cup of coffee with no mess or clean-up.
Source:-IHG
